item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，LME场内经纪商Sigma寻求出售金属部门
item.description: 两位知情人士称，Sigma Broking 是伦敦金属交易所允许在公开市场交易的八家会员之一，该公司在加入三年后正试图出售其基本金属业务。【原文：Sigma Broking, one of eight members of the London Metal Exchange allowed to trade on the open-outcry floor, is trying to sell its base metals business three years after joining, two sources with knowledge of the situation said.】

item.title: 消息人士称贝莱德准备在欧洲推出比特币交易所交易产品
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，贝莱德正准备在几周内在欧洲推出一款比特币交易所交易产品，因为资金经理和消费者对加密货币的需求都在不断增长。【原文：BlackRock is gearing up to launch a bitcoin exchange-traded product in Europe within weeks, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters, amid growing demand for exposure to cryptocurrencies from both money managers and consumers.】

item.title: 中国就特朗普关税发起世贸组织争端
item.description: 总部位于日内瓦的世界贸易组织（WTO）周三表示，中国已就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国商品征收关税一事向该组织发起争端。【原文：China has launched a dispute at the World Trade Organization (WTO) over tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump on Chinese goods, the Geneva-based body said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，Tiktok 的中国所有者似乎正在缓慢进行出售谈判
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周三报道，短视频应用 TikTok 的所有者 ByteDance 似乎正在缓慢地进行出售谈判，同时等待中国政府的批准，即使在唐纳德-特朗普总统的盟友竞相促成将 TikTok 出售给美国竞标者的交易时也是如此。【原文：Short video app TikTok's owner ByteDance seems to be slow-rolling negotiations for a sale while waiting for approval from the Chinese government, even as President Donald Trump's allies race to broker a deal to sell it to an American bidder, the Washington Post reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行可能将利率降至 9.5%
item.description: 路透社周三的一项民意调查显示，随着通胀降温和经济在去年年底出现轻微萎缩，墨西哥央行很可能在本周晚些时候将基准利率下调 50 个基点，使其降至 9.50%。【原文：Mexico's central bank will likely cut its benchmark interest rate by 50 basis points later this week, taking it to 9.50%, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday, as inflation cools and the economy notched a slight contraction late last year.】

item.title: 行业观察家称空客一月份产量和交付量下降
item.description: 英国 Cirium Ascend 公司的数据显示，在经历了数月的供应链动荡之后，空中客车公司在 12 月份向终点线冲刺，但今年的商用喷气机生产和交付开局相对缓慢。【原文：Airbus had a relatively slow start to the year in commercial jet production and deliveries after sprinting towards the finish line in December following months of supply chain turbulence, according to data from UK-based Cirium Ascend.】

item.title: 谷歌称商业量子计算应用将在五年内实现
item.description: 谷歌量子部门负责人周三告诉路透社，谷歌的目标是在五年内发布商业量子计算应用，这是对英伟达公司（Nvidia）预测的20年等待时间的挑战。【原文：Google aims to release commercial quantum computing applications within five years, Google's head of quantum told Reuters on Wednesday, in a challenge to Nvidia's predictions of a 20-year wait.】

item.title: 谷歌推出新型廉价人工智能模型，成本问题日益突出
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周三宣布更新其 Gemini 系列大型语言模型，其中包括一个新的产品系列，其定价与中国竞争对手 DeepSeek 等低成本人工智能模型相比具有竞争力。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Wednesday announced updates to its Gemini family of large language models, including a new product line with competitive pricing to low-cost artificial intelligence models like that of Chinese rival DeepSeek.】

item.title: 亚马逊的云计算业务在竞争对手微软和谷歌的打击下面临严峻考验
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）在本周四发布的第四季度财报中兑现了对云计算的崇高期望，而微软（Microsoft）和谷歌（Google）乏善可陈的财报动摇了投资者对大科技公司在人工智能领域数十亿美元投资的信心，亚马逊公司面临的压力可想而知。【原文：The pressure is on Amazon.com to deliver on lofty expectations for cloud computing in its fourth-quarter results on Thursday, after Microsoft and Google's lackluster reports jolted investor faith in Big Tech's billion-dollar investments in AI.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，澳大利亚麦格理将关闭美国债务资本市场部门
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引未具名知情人士的话报道称，澳大利亚麦格理公司将关闭其美国债务资本市场部门，计划将资源集中用于私人信贷。【原文：Australia's Macquarie is set to shutter its U.S. debt capital markets arm, as it plans to focus its resources on private credit, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国工人工会负责人申请驳回美国钢铁公司和新日本制铁公司的诉讼
item.description: 美国钢铁工人联合会（United Steelworkers）主席戴维-麦考尔（David McCall）提出动议，要求驳回美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）和新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel）对他提起的诉讼。【原文：United Steelworkers president David McCall filed a motion to dismiss a lawsuit filed against him by U.S. Steel and Nippon Steel , the union said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 1 月服务业降温，价格压力减弱
item.description: 由于需求降温，1 月份美国服务业活动意外放缓，从而抑制了价格增长。【原文：U.S. services sector activity unexpectedly slowed in January amid cooling demand, helping to curb price growth.】

item.title: 特斯拉一月份德国汽车销量骤降
item.description: 1 月份，特斯拉在德国的汽车销量比去年同期减少了近 60%，这家美国电动汽车制造商在其亿万富翁首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）参与政治活动的新闻报道中面临着人气考验。【原文：Tesla sold almost 60% fewer cars in Germany in January than in the year-earlier period, as the U.S. electric vehicle maker faces a test of popularity amid headline-grabbing political involvement by its billionaire CEO Elon Musk.】

item.title: 乌克兰称有可能从美国购买和储存液化天然气
item.description: 乌克兰外长周三表示，乌克兰和其他欧洲国家有可能从美国购买液化天然气（LNG）并将其储存在乌克兰。【原文：Ukraine and other European nations have the potential to buy and store liquefied natural gas (LNG) from the United States in Ukraine and this could strengthen Europe's energy security as gas transits from Russia end, its foreign minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 数据显示，2024 年法国干邑出口将因中国措施而下滑
item.description: 一个行业游说团体周三提供的数据显示，由于中国经济陷入困境以及中国政府对欧洲白兰地出口采取反倾销措施，去年法国白兰地对华出口额下降了近四分之一。【原文：The value of French cognac exports to China fell by nearly a quarter last year as the Chinese economy struggled and Beijing imposed anti-dumping measures on European brandy exports, according to data shared by an industry lobby group on Wednesday.】

item.title: 芭比娃娃母公司美泰股价大涨，利润预期强劲，尽管有关税担忧
item.description: 美泰公司周三在盘前交易中股价大涨 14%，此前这家风火轮生产商公布了乐观的年度利润预期，并暗示尽管存在关税相关的不确定性，但玩具需求将趋于稳定。【原文：Mattel shares surged 14% in premarket trading on Wednesday after the Hot Wheels maker provided an upbeat annual profit forecast and hinted at stabilizing toy demand, despite tariff-related uncertainty.】

item.title: AMD 49 亿美元收购 ZT Systems 交易将于 3 月 12 日前面临欧盟反垄断裁决
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三提交的一份文件显示，欧盟反垄断监管机构将在 3 月 12 日前决定是否批准美国芯片制造商 AMD 49 亿美元收购服务器制造商 ZT Systems 的交易。【原文：European Union antitrust regulators will decide by March 12 whether to clear U.S. chipmaker AMD's $4.9 billion bid for server maker ZT Systems, a European Commission filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: GlobalFoundries 任命 Tim Breen 为首席执行官
item.description: 合约芯片制造商 GlobalFoundries 周三表示，公司已任命 Tim Breen 为首席执行官。【原文：Contract chipmaker GlobalFoundries has appointed Tim Breen as its chief executive officer, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 12 月贸易逆差急剧扩大，进口创历史新高
item.description: 在关税威胁的背景下，由于进口激增至历史新高，美国 12 月份的贸易赤字急剧扩大。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit widened sharply in December as imports surged to a record high against the backdrop of tariff threats.】

item.title: 由于工业元器件需求强劲，Emerson 季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周三，工程解决方案供应商 Emerson 的第一季度利润超出预期，这主要得益于其阀门和调压器部门的强劲需求。【原文：Engineering solutions provider Emerson topped first-quarter profit estimates on Wednesday, fueled by resilient demand in its valves and regulators unit.】

item.title: 瓦锡兰首席执行官称，尽管特朗普上台，美国能源转型仍将继续
item.description: 发电厂制造商瓦锡兰公司（Wartsila）首席执行官周三表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税，但由于可再生能源价格更低，美国仍将继续从化石燃料向可再生能源过渡。【原文：The transition from fossil fuels to renewable energy will continue in the U.S. despite President Donald Trump's tariffs due to renewable energy's cheaper pricing, the CEO of power plant maker Wartsila said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份私营部门薪资增长回升
item.description: 周三发布的《ADP全国就业报告》显示，1月份美国私营企业的薪资增长有所回升。【原文：U.S. private payrolls growth picked up in January, the ADP National Employment Report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 福特汽油车主管将扩大领导电动车部门的角色
item.description: 福特汽车周三表示，其汽油车业务总裁安德鲁-弗里克（Andrew Frick）将兼任亏损的电动车业务主管。【原文：Ford said on Wednesday the president of its gasoline vehicles business, Andrew Frick, would take on the additional role of leading its money-losing electric vehicle business.】

item.title: 美国邮政表示将接受所有来自中国大陆和香港的入境包裹
item.description: 美国邮政服务公司（U.S. Postal Service）表示，将于周三恢复接收来自中国和香港的所有入境邮件和包裹，此前一天曾暂时停止此类服务。【原文：The U.S. Postal Service said it will resume accepting all inbound mail and packages from China and Hong Kong on Wednesday, a day after temporarily suspending such service.】

item.title: 巴金称美联储在不确定性中倾向于进一步降息
item.description: 里士满联储主席汤姆-巴尔金（Tom Barkin）周三表示，尽管特朗普政府新举措对关税、移民和法规等方面的影响存在不确定性，但美国联邦储备委员会仍倾向于在今年进一步降息。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is still leaning toward further rate cuts this year, although uncertainty about the impact of new Trump administration initiatives on things like tariffs, immigration and regulations will need to be better understood, Richmond Fed President Tom Barkin said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 江森自控上调 2025 年利润预期，任命新首席执行官
item.description: 江森自控国际公司（Johnson Controls International）任命乔基姆-魏德迈尼斯（Joakim Weidemanis）为首席执行官，并在周三上调了 2025 年的利润预期，使其股价在收盘前上涨了近 8%。【原文：Johnson Controls International named Joakim Weidemanis as chief executive officer and lifted its 2025 profit forecast on Wednesday, sending its shares up nearly 8% before the bell.】

item.title: 乌克兰的稀土是什么？为什么特朗普想要这些稀土？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一表示，他希望乌克兰向其提供稀土，以换取基辅对俄罗斯战争的财政支持。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday he wanted Ukraine to supply the country with rare earths in return for financially supporting Kyiv's war effort against Russia.】

item.title: Assa Abloy 首席执行官表示，如果美国对加拿大和墨西哥实施关税，Assa Abloy 将提高价格
item.description: 瑞典阿萨-阿布罗伊公司首席执行官周三表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普继续对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税，该公司计划提高价格。【原文：Sweden's Assa Abloy plans to raise its prices if U.S. President Donald Trump moves ahead with the tariffs on Canada and Mexico, the CEO of the world's biggest lockmaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Starboard 提名四名董事进入 Kenvue 董事会
item.description: 周三的一份监管文件显示，对冲基金 Starboard Value 已提名包括其首席投资官在内的四名董事进入消费品公司 Kenvue 董事会。【原文：Hedge fund Starboard Value has nominated four directors, including its chief investment officer, to the board of consumer products company Kenvue , a regulatory filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 纽约时报》预计第一季度订阅收入低于预期
item.description: 纽约时报》周三预测第一季度订阅收入增长低于华尔街预期，表明吸引新订户的竞争日益激烈。【原文：The New York Times forecast first-quarter subscription revenue growth below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling growing competition to attract new subscribers.】
